   14: 
   15: """Exceptions raised by the BSON package."""
   16: from __future__ import annotations
   17: 
   18: 
   19: class BSONError(Exception):
   20:     """Base class for all BSON exceptions."""
   21: 
   22: 
   23: class InvalidBSON(BSONError):
   24:     """Raised when trying to create a BSON object from invalid data."""
   25: 
   26: 
   27: class InvalidStringData(BSONError):
   28:     """Raised when trying to encode a string containing non-UTF8 data."""
   29: 
   30: 
   31: class InvalidDocument(BSONError):
   32:     """Raised when trying to create a BSON object from an invalid document."""
   33: 
   34: 
   35: class InvalidId(BSONError):
   36:     """Raised when trying to create an ObjectId from invalid data."""
